string-array.name: network_error_messages
string-array.item: I felt a great disturbance in the Force... I fear something terrible has happened.
There is a great disturbance in the Force.
We had a reactor leak here now. Give us a few minutes to lock it down. Large leak, very dangerous.
I have a very bad feeling about this.
Uh, we had a slight weapons malfunction, but uh...
